optionHelpText: You will need to contact HMRC to agree an alternative method for weighing materials. Contact details will be provided after completing this registration.

fields.label: Do you have a controller at this site?
fields.helpText:
If a person other than the site operator (or permit holder) determines what materials (if any) are disposed of at this site, or as part of this site, that person is a controller. 

A person who is acting purely as an agent or an employee of someone else is not a controller

fields.infoText: By submitting this registration you confirm that the information you have provided is true and complete.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted registration.

You must check the guidance for this service on GOV.UK to see whether you need to fill in and send any additional forms to complete your registration. For example, if your business is a partnership you must also fill in and send form LT2.

HMRC will send you a letter to confirm your registration details and return dates so that you can prepare your first Landfill Tax return. 

If you do not use a weighbridge at any of your sites you will also need to get in touch with the Excise team on enquiries.eeitts@hmrc.gsi.gov.uk to agree an alternative method for weighing your waste.
